title: Looking for people to play with
body:
Recently got back into League after a long break and I'm looking for to make some new friends to just play normals (or ranked soon maybe) with me. Add me if you're keen :)

IGN: alex009

replies.body: Did you add me a few days ago? Lets do normal games if we are online together
don't bother I came back this season and it's just filled with aids. feeders, ragers, smurfs, players who just want to do there own thing and not work together, nothing has really changed
